text: Sergio Graziani (10 November 1930 – 25 May 2018) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was born in Udine, Italy. Graziani was known for his movies The Five Days and Goodnight, Ladies and Gentlemen. He also voiced dubbed Peter O'Toole, Donald Sutherland, Michael Caine and Professor Farnsworth (voiced by: Billy West). Graziani died on 25 May 2018 in Rome, Italy at the age of 87.Morto il doppiatore Sergio Graziani, voce storica di Peter O’Toole, Donald Sutherland, Michael Caine e Farnsworth di Futurama == References == == Other websites == * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from Udine
title: Sergio Graziani
